sentences.sContent: A section of the reading public has an insatiable appetite for dirty stories about the famous.
sentences.sCn: 阅读大众中有一部分人对名人的风流韵事的欲望总是无法满足。

remMethod.val: in (不) + sat (充满的) + i + able (能够…的) → 不能够满的 → 不知足的

words.tran: 贪得无厌地；无法满足地

trans.tranCn: 不知足的， 贪求无厌的
trans.tranOther: always wanting more and more of something
